sentences.en: A grey carpet was removed to reveal the original pine floor.
sentences.cn: 一块灰色的地毯被揭开，露出了原来的松木地板。

sentences.en: All the rooms had fitted carpets (= carpets cut to fit the shape of the rooms ) .
sentences.cn: 所有的房间都铺了全室地毯。

sentences.en: Beer splashed the carpet.
sentences.cn: 啤酒洒到了地毯上。

sentences.en: Broken glass lay scattered on the carpet.
sentences.cn: 碎玻璃散落在地毯上。

sentences.en: Coal fell out of the fire, and burned the carpet.
sentences.cn: 炉火中迸出的煤块烧着了地毯。

sentences.en: I rolled a ball across the carpet.
sentences.cn: 我把球滚过地毯。

sentences.en: It is not possible to reposition the carpet without damaging it.
sentences.cn: 想要挪动地毯又不让它损坏是不可能的。

sentences.en: Its brass feet dented the carpet's thick pile.
sentences.cn: 其黄铜支脚把厚绒地毯压出了印。

sentences.en: My bare feet were soundless over the carpet.
sentences.cn: 我赤脚无声无息地走在毯子上。

sentences.en: My bedroom carpet is green.
sentences.cn: 我卧室里的地毯是绿色的。

sentences.en: Several important matters will be on the carpet at today's meeting.
sentences.cn: 几个重要的问题要求在今天的会议上讨论

sentences.en: Sheep were munching their way through a yellow carpet of leaves.
sentences.cn: 绵羊边吃边走，穿行在厚厚的一层黄色落叶中间。

sentences.en: The building has been carpeted throughout.
sentences.cn: 大楼里上上下下都铺了地毯。

sentences.en: The carpet of leaves in my yard became more and more noticeable.
sentences.cn: 我的院子里的落叶越来越厚。

sentences.en: The carpet of pine needles was soft underfoot.
sentences.cn: 脚下厚厚的松针踩上去软绵绵的。

sentences.en: The carpet was a wedding present from the Prime Minister.
sentences.cn: 这张地毯是首相送的结婚礼物。

sentences.en: The multicoloured rag rug was chosen to liven up the grey carpet.
sentences.cn: 选择这块五彩缤纷的碎呢小毯是为了给这灰色的地毯添些生气。

sentences.en: was called on the carpet for cheating.
sentences.cn: 因蒙骗被叫去训斥

sentences.en: We'll give her some VIP treatment and roll out the red carpet.
sentences.cn: 我们将给予她贵宾级礼遇，并且为她铺设红地毯。

sentences.en: While the water was heating she decided to shake out the carpet.
sentences.cn: 趁着烧水的时候，她决定将地毯抖抖干净。

words.tran_cn: 在…上铺地毯，把地毯铺在…上；斥责

phrases.tran_cn: n. （《一千零一夜》中载人飞行的）魔毯；幻想中的神奇无比的交通工具
（迎接贵宾用的）红地毯；隆重的接待

trans.tran_cn: 地毯，覆盖地表的一层东西
trans.tran_en: heavy woven material for covering floors or stairs, or a piece of this material
to cover a floor with carpet
